Primitive Christianity, or, The religion of the ancient Christians in the first ages of the Gospel in three parts / by William Cave. Cave, William, 1637-1713.
The second edition.
[39], 352, 389, [6] p.
Printed by J.M. for Richard Chiswell ..., London : 1675.
Has added engraved t.p. "Chronological index of authors" at end of work. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
